statements: UPDATE customers SET first_name='John', last_name='Doe', email='john.doe@example.com', phone_number='1234567890', subscription_plan='Basic' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE customers SET last_name='Smith', first_name='Jane', subscription_plan='Premium', phone_number='9876543210', email='jane.smith@example.com' WHERE customer_id=2;

UPDATE subscriptions SET start_date='2022-01-01', end_date='2022-12-31', service_name='Platinum' WHERE subscription_id=1001;

UPDATE address SET street='1234 Elm St', city='New City' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE customers SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE subscriptions SET end_date = '2023-12-31' WHERE subscription_type = 'Gold' AND customer_id = (SELECT customer_id FROM customers WHERE name = 'John Doe');
